All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
Board
this is the important class of the program which controls every disk in the map and players status and checks the game in every turn and also changes the turn.
Disk
This is the Disk class where we keep a single disk information like x value and y value in the board and the type of the disk which can be normal 1st or 2nd player disk or a hint disk.
HintDisk
This is a subclass of the disk class.
Othello
this class is the program main execute part.
Player
this class saves the player information like the player number ond the number of disks the player have.
PrintGame
this class will print the method in our cmd page and in general it makes the output.
RunningTest
Just a test for the game.
